# Blessing of the Righteous (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level: [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]]**, [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 40 ft.

**Area:** All allies in a 40-ft.-radius burst centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 104

*A sudden burst of warm, radiant light engulfs you and your allies. The light fades quickly but lingers on the weapons of those affected.*

You bless yourself and your allies. You and your alliesâ€™ melee and ranged attacks deal an extra 1d6 points of holy damage and are considered good-aligned for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
